explains: adv. 坚硬无比地；坚强地；固执地；不动摇地

sentences.en: His family were adamantly opposed to the marriage.
sentences.cn: 他的家人坚决反对这门亲事。

sentences.en: She was adamantly opposed to her husband taking this trip.
sentences.cn: 她坚决地反对她丈夫进行这次旅行。

sentences.en: But so far, Germany adamantly opposes the eurobond solution.
sentences.cn: 可是，迄今为止德国坚决地反对欧洲债券解决方案。
